text:
Your requests 1, 2 & 3 are arithmetically correct, but I would query your "Total Money Transacted" figures. These are the sums being temporarily held on the Betfair system pending the result of the market. But the amounts actually transacted won't be known until the result is confirmed when, for request 1, it will be 100  or 20 depending on whether the back bet loses or wins.

I can't really comment on the remainder of your post, as I don't understand what you're trying to do here. Subtracting liabilities doesn't really make sense to me unless the same trader is both backing and laying the same selection.
